componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Instructions to test manually

﻿1. Open Developer Console

2. Go to Debug > Open Execute Anonymous Window

3. Update the text below with your intake id and file info id. Paste into execute anonymous window.

4. Click Execute


List<Tekmir_SendToTekmirInvocable.FlowInputs> request = new List<Tekmir_SendToTekmirInvocable.FlowInputs>();

Tekmir_SendToTekmirInvocable.FlowInputs input = new Tekmir_SendToTekmirInvocable.FlowInputs();

input.intakeId = 'INTAKE_ID_GOES_HERE';

input.fileIds = new List<string>{'FILE_INFO_ID_1_GOES_HERE','FILE_INFO_ID_2_GOES_HERE'};

request.add(input);

Tekmir_SendToTekmirInvocable.submitToTekmir(request);
